original_text: For wickedness burneth as the fire: it shall devour the briers and thorns, and shall kindle in the thickets of the forest, and they shall mount up like the lifting up of smoke.
korean_text: 대저 악행은 불 타오르는 것 같으니 곧 찔레와 가시를 삼키며 빽빽한 수풀을 살라 연기가 위로 올라가게 함과 같은 것이라

sentences.original_text: For wickedness burneth as the fire
it shall devour the briers and thorns
and shall kindle in the thickets of the forest
and they shall mount up like the lifting up of smoke
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 연기가 오르는 것처럼 솟아오를 것이라
